name: Product Launch
description: Full product launch pipeline from strategy to execution

steps.task: Create launch strategy for {{product_name}}: target audience, positioning, timeline.
Write product announcement blog post and press release.
Review and suggest visual assets needed for the launch.
Create social media campaign plan and draft posts.
Prepare sales materials and outreach templates.
Schedule all launch activities on the calendar.

variables.product_name: Name of the product being launched
